Article.ArticleTitle: Advances in Methods and Technologies for Carcass and Meat Quality Evaluation.

Abstract.AbstractText: The importance of advanced methods and technologies in the meat industry has increased significantly in the last decade, reflecting broader trends in consumer demand and food safety [...].
